content.text:
Use the GITHUB_TOKEN to push to GitHub:

1. First, check if git repo exists: cd /root/clawd && git status

2. If not a git repo:
   - git init
   - git add .
   - git commit -m "Initial commit: Add NBA player props research"

3. Set up the remote using the GITHUB_TOKEN for authentication:
   git remote add origin https://GITHUB_TOKEN@github.com/IWONTHEMONEY-01/clawd-bot.git

4. Create the branch:
   git checkout -b feature/nba-player-props

5. Push to GitHub:
   git push -u origin feature/nba-player-props

6. After successful push, report back:
   - GitHub URL: https://github.com/IWONTHEMONEY-01/clawd-bot
   - Branch: feature/nba-player-props
   - Confirm the nba-player-props.md file is there

If there are any errors, report the exact error message. The user provided GITHUB_TOKEN as a personal access token for authentication.
